info.name: Hitbox Colors (Smashcast - Dark Theme)
info.description:
Changes many of the colors on Smashcast to how they were when the site was still Hitbox.

This could also be consider a dark theme.
info.additionalInfo:
This is still a work-in-progress. A couple of things still need to be tweaked, but if you're looking for a Hitbox theme or a dark theme, then this should be right up your alley!

Update 1: Finished the bulk of the homapage and homepage tabs ("For You", "Browse", etc).

Most pages are now usable compared to before where there were instances of white text on white backgrounds, though there are still a few pages that need their colors tweaking.
